    • Method Detail

      • getAllRoutes

        @ResponseStatus(value=OK)
 @RequestMapping(value="user/{user_id}/travel/{travel_id}/route",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public List<APIRoute> getAllRoutes(@PathVariable(value="user_id")
                                                                                                                                                                              int userId,
                                                                                                                                                                              @PathVariable(value="travel_id")
                                                                                                                                                                              int travelId)
                                                                                                                                                                       throws DatabaseResponseException
        HTTP GET method for all routes of a user
        Parameters:
        userId - The Id of a user
        travelId - The Id of a travel
        Returns:
        A list of route objects
        Throws:
        DatabaseResponseException - This is thrown when the connection to the database fails.
        See Also:
        APIRoute

      • createRoute

        @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @RequestMapping(value="user/{user_id}/travel/{travel_id}/route",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public APIRoute createRoute(@PathVariable(value="user_id")
                                                                                                                                                                             int userId,
                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable(value="travel_id")
                                                                                                                                                                             int travelId,
                                                                                                                                                                             @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                             APIRoute route)
                                                                                                                                                                      throws NotExistingResponseException,
                                                                                                                                                                             ExistingResponseException,
                                                                                                                                                                             DatabaseResponseException
        HTTP POST method for routes
        Parameters:
        userId - the Id of a user
        travelId - The Id of a travel
        route - The route we want to create
        Returns:
        The route object that has been created
        Throws:
        NotExistingResponseException - This is thrown when no route or user can be found.
        ExistingResponseException - This is thrown when the route already exists.
        DatabaseResponseException - This is thrown when the connection to the database fails.
        See Also:
        APIRoute

      • getRoute

        @ResponseStatus(value=OK)
 @RequestMapping(value="user/{user_id}/travel/{travel_id}/route/{route_id}",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public APIRoute getRoute(@PathVariable(value="user_id")
                                                                                                                                                                               int userId,
                                                                                                                                                                               @PathVariable(value="travel_id")
                                                                                                                                                                               int travelId,
                                                                                                                                                                               @PathVariable(value="route_id")
                                                                                                                                                                               int routeId)
                                                                                                                                                                        throws NotExistingResponseException,
                                                                                                                                                                               DatabaseResponseException
        HTTP GET method for a route of a user
        Parameters:
        userId - the Id of a user
        travelId - The Id of a travel
        routeId - the Id of a route
        Returns:
        The route object that has the corresponding id
        Throws:
        NotExistingResponseException - This is thrown when no route or user can be found.
        DatabaseResponseException - This is thrown when the connection to the database fails.
        See Also:
        APIRoute

      • modifyRoute

        @ResponseStatus(value=OK)
 @RequestMapping(value="user/{user_id}/travel/{travel_id}/route/{route_id}",
                method=PUT)
 @ResponseBody
public APIRoute modifyRoute(@PathVariable(value="user_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                  int userId,
                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable(value="travel_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                  int travelId,
                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable(value="route_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                  int routeId,
                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                  APIRoute route)
                                                                                                                                                                           throws ExistingResponseException,
                                                                                                                                                                                  NotExistingResponseException,
                                                                                                                                                                                  DatabaseResponseException
        HTTP PUT method for routes
        Parameters:
        userId - the Id of a user
        travelId - The Id of a travel
        routeId - the Id of a route
        route - The route we want to modify
        Returns:
        The route object that has been modified
        Throws:
        ExistingResponseException - Thrown if the route can't be created because it exists already
        NotExistingResponseException - This is thrown when no route or user can be found.
        DatabaseResponseException - This is thrown when the connection to the database fails.
        See Also:
        APIRoute

      • deleteRoute

        @RequestMapping(value="user/{user_id}/travel/{travel_id}/route/{route_id}",
                method=DELETE)
 @ResponseStatus(value=NO_CONTENT)
public void deleteRoute(@PathVariable(value="user_id")
                                                                                                                                                                         int userId,
                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="travel_id")
                                                                                                                                                                         int travelId,
                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="route_id")
                                                                                                                                                                         int routeId)
                                                                                                                                                                  throws DatabaseResponseException,
                                                                                                                                                                         NotExistingResponseException
        HTTP DELETE method for routes
        Parameters:
        userId - the Id of a user
        travelId - The Id of a travel
        routeId - the Id of the route
        Throws:
        DatabaseResponseException - This is thrown when the connection to the database fails.
        NotExistingResponseException - This is thrown when no route or user can be found.
